name: Strength Day (Long Session) – Finger Max Strength Focus

intent.notes: Primary stimulus is max finger force. Secondary modules must not reduce main-set quality.

quick_checklist: No sharp finger pain at baseline

if_failed.notes: If pain or skin is a limiter, reduce intensity/volume or switch to health-focused protocol.

grip_rotation.notes: Keep grip variety controlled; do not add many grips in a single session.

stop_rules.notes: Stop immediately for sharp finger or elbow pain.
If you cannot maintain consistent grip/form, end the main set early.
If failing too early, reduce total load and keep session sub-failure.

target_effort.notes: Near maximal, but avoid repeated true failure efforts.

modules.notes: Primary module includes its own specific warm-up and main hang protocol selection.

protocol_examples: Hörst-style 7/53: 7s hang + 53s rest x3 per set; 2–5 sets; ~3 min between sets.
Lattice-style max hangs can be expressed as 8 reps x 10s with ~4 min between reps (definition of sets/reps can vary).
coach_notes.warmup_emphasis: Warm-up should be gradual: general heat + mobility + activation, then specific progressive loading on the hangboard.
coach_notes.post_session: Finish with light antagonist/wrist stabilizer work when appropriate.

load_model_hint.notes: Compute daily/weekly load by aggregating module stress_tags; apply multipliers for session duration and perceived intensity.
